title: "Champ Select", but screen still shows home page, counter :30 sec
body:
Had a weird bug twice today, both caused me to get "dodge" penalty.

I'm trying to play normal draft mode, I enter queue, accept match thing pops up, I click to join.  The bar above my friends list says "Champion Select 0:30" and nothing happens. The timer is frozen, I can't access the champ select screen. So I tried closing and got the dodge penalty screen when I try to join a game.

Also a side bug, some of the font in chat during the game is distorted. Like "r" is missing part of the letter in some sentences.

Any ideas what's going on?

replies.body: Sometimes that can happen if your network can't get a strong enough signal to the server, so you're never fully placed into the lobby. Run through your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quick just to make sure everything is still setup properly there, but definitely let me know if that doesn't seem to help much.
